Wireframes, Mockups and Prototyping

Use this: www.pencil.evolus.vn

Pen and paper for wireframing (or you can use the above software like Pencil)

Photoshop for Mockups

HTML and CSS for prototyping

This is some practice for the students + theory on why do this in the first place? For web apps or content based sites, and as freelancers working for clients.
